A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In the course of her training, the girl meets a charming aristocrat who offers to fix the race for an entry fee. She is then faced with having to go against him in the steeplechase at the risk of betraying her trusted trainer.
